name: NewGate Capital Partners
overview:
Evolving from proven and solid business owner & entrepreneur background, the Partners of NewGate endeavor to assist other Entrepreneurs in every Transitions of their business through the execution of appropriate financial solutions and strategic partnerships.

NewGate understands and appreciates the challenges in exploring options relating to funding and valuation of Early Stage businesses. What the Entrepreneurs requires to make a positive informed decision is an experienced Capital Partner they can confide in and trust. NewGate offers a boutique environment catering to a selected clientele and provides the right advice, analysis, and tools in development, planning, and execution of the best financial strategy for early stage companies.

NewGate prides itself in its Fund Management and its own Portfolio of exciting companies and also bringing its network of successful individual and institutional investors, making them available to provide the relationship benefits from being part of a true Capital Partnership.

NewGate’s Mergers and Acquisition team enjoys a successful track record in identifying opportunities for companies in the search for an ideal buyer, partner, or investor. NewGate performs target searches across the United States, Canada and Europe. Within the M&A universe NewGate’s job is to become the missing ingredient, to positively impact the Company’s goals and objectives.

NewGate never performs services as an intermediary. Unlike an Investment Banker or a Securities Broker/Dealer, NewGate is a key Capital Partner in every transaction giving Entrepreneurs momentum to get to the closing table.

NewGate brings quality people together to facilitate every conceivable financial solution, ensuring long term success to Entrepreneurs. We are the Capital Partner from Seed Capital to Succession Planning.
